text.text: Kentrosaurus, a medium stegosaurid from Tanzania from the Tendaguru Formation. From stegosauridae, it's oftan thought to be a primitive stegosaur, but that is not the case, being closer related to Stegosaurus from the Morrison Formation. Discovered in 1909, described in 1915, it was a victim of WWII, with a lot of skeletons being destroyed.
Kentrosaurus was 4.6 meters from nose to tail, around the size of a large tigon. It would've been a grazer much like its North American cousin, Stegosaurus.
